name: Solar Quest
description:
Made for LOWREZJAM 2022 Controls: - X  to Jump
- C to Shoot ( Available after a certain stage )
- R to Restart - Arrow Key for Movement Save yourself from the soul-sucker sun gods by retrieving gems across various temple!

In this game, you'll be playing as a body who's soul is in line to be eaten by the sun gods as a sacrifice. To escape from the sacrifice, you have to make a deal with the Sun Gods by collecting some of the famous lost gems and relics in some of the deadly temple full of booby traps across the south island!

Take on the adventure and fight for your soul, and against the Sun Gods as well!

Credits:
- Fauzan as a Programmer

- David as a Sound Designer

- Shidky as a 2D Artist

-------------------------------------------------------------------
